Here is a list of required visual elements:

*   A rectangular node labeled "Software Development".
*   A rectangular node labeled "Planning".
*   A rectangular node labeled "Development".
*   A rectangular node labeled "Requirement Gathering".
*   A rectangular node labeled "Risk Assessment".
*   A rectangular node labeled "Coding".
*   A rectangular node labeled "Testing".
*   A directional arrow from the "Software Development" node to the "Planning" node.
*   A directional arrow from the "Software Development" node to the "Development" node.
*   A directional arrow from the "Planning" node to the "Requirement Gathering" node.
*   A directional arrow from the "Planning" node to the "Risk Assessment" node.
*   A directional arrow from the "Development" node to the "Coding" node.
*   A directional arrow from the "Development" node to the "Testing" node.
*   Top-level visual placement for the "Software Development" node.
*   Second-level visual placement for "Planning" and "Development" nodes, subordinate to "Software Development".
*   Third-level visual placement for "Requirement Gathering" and "Risk Assessment" nodes, subordinate to "Planning".
*   Third-level visual placement for "Coding" and "Testing" nodes, subordinate to "Development".
*   Clear text labels on all specified nodes.
*   Clear directional indicators on all specified arrows.
